snippet.title: Sunderfolk | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Sunderfolk™ is a couch co-op, turn-based tactical RPG, inspired by board games and tabletop RPGs, where you use your phone as the controller. One to four players can take up the mantle of one of six unique classes (Arcanist, Bard, Berserker, Pyromancer, Ranger, and Rogue), each with their own set of Skill Cards to suit different playstyles, and adventure together through the magical and dangerous Sunderlands.

Between missions, players will return to Arden and help improve the village. You'll unlock and upgrade different local vendors, build relationships with other Sunderfolk to earn rewards, and outfit your characters with new Skills, Weapons, Trinkets, and more.

Your goal, as the heroes of Arden, is to protect the town and its Brightshard from the corruption of shadowstone and defeat the threats from the surrounding Sunderlands. 

Wishlist now:
